thread.title: Rumour Has It: Parineeti Chopra Has A New Man In Her Life
thread.title_full: Rumour Has It: Parineeti Chopra Has A New Man In Her Life

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Rumour Has It: Parineeti Chopra Has A New Man In Her Life
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 28 . 2017 Parineeti Chopra 
Parineeti Chopra may have been absent from the silver screen for a long time, but the charmer has been in the news on and off. Apart from her sexy dance number in Dhishoom , the actress grabbed headlines for her drastic makeover and her break up with director Maneesh Sharma . 
On the work front, Pari is gearing up for her next release, Meri Pyari Bindu opposite Ayushmaan Khurrana . She is also travelling quite a lot due to professional reasons â€“ and we hear that during one such trip to Dubai, she was spotted with a mystery man. According to a popular tabloid, she was spotted hand-in-hand with her male companion at a popular mall in Dubai. Reportedly, when a fan asked her for a selfie, she politely refused asking for some privacy. 
Oooh! Spill the beans, Pari! 0
